pullRequest.title: Hook up Galaxy as a pf4j plugin
pullRequest.bodyText:
Working on https://ucsc-cgl.atlassian.net/browse/SEAB-757

languagePluginLocation is now a dockstore config setting, otherwise webservice will look for plugins in <home>/language-plugins
seems to work with Java 11 upgraded pf4j allows for plugin jars to be used without the use of zip files
Galaxy plugin (plus lack of plugin) is tested with a minimal endpoint (/metadata/descriptorLanguagues)
removed a few sections of hardcoded language support, delegating to plugins

Relies on galaxyproject/dockstore-galaxy-interface#9
Will need similar follow-up work to remove more hardcoded language support, usually indicated with DOCKSTORE-2428

commit.message:
[skip ci]

Beginnings of generic language support for tools and DAG.
Add listing files inteface method to help with rate limit
Debug galaxy plugin in circle [skip travis]
Static caches causing problems when restarting DropwizardTestSupport

beforeCommit.message: Final grudge match logging for Monday [skip travis]

afterCommit.message: Static caches causing problems when restarting DropwizardTestSupport

nodes.bodyText: The description for the value is out of date -- doesn't match allowable values.
Do you want to expose this? It's showing up in the openapi/swagger doc.
A small nit. For readability this section could use String.format in addition to the append so that we can avoid lines that are just builder.append("\t").
